author: Special Correspondent
text:
The need to preserve water sources, revive ‘kudimaramaththu’ system and put and end to the growth of seemai karuvelam trees was highlighted in a seminar and practical demonstration organised as part of an environment awareness campaign at Andipatti village near Vadipatti recently.

Ramu, panchayat president, presided over the programme, which was organised by Power Project, Sholavandan, in association with Peace Trust.
title: Awareness campaign
